effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 947,433 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 521,124.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

spells.description: Use: Bask a single friendly target in the censer's glow, applying a shield that absorbs up to 850,540 damage for 15 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Dr. Scrapheal to heal your target additionally for 198,437.

When a nearby ally's health falls below 35%, Dr. Scrapheal springs into action, delivering instant care to heal them for 773,568. This effect can only activate once every 1 min.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
